item.description:
Community Review üëç: The commenter enjoyed the series for its exploration of friendship and life in post-WW2 Naples, despite the books being lengthy.

"Neapolitan Novels by Elena Ferrante is a 4-book series that follows two childhood friends as they grow up in post WW2 Naples. They books are a bit long, but I really enjoyed them."
